content: basic linen stitch square crochet by j mcstitch materials 5mm crochet hook 50g #4 worsted weight cotton yarn darning needle abbreviations beg - beginning chain chain prev - previous single_crochet single_crochet skip - skip st stitch directions make a slip knot and place it on the hook chain 39 1 single_crochet in 3rd chain from hook *chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet in the next chain* repeat from * to * until 2 chains remain ch1 sk1 single_crochet in the last chain turn your work 2 chain 2 single_crochet in the first chain space *chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet in the next chain space* repeat from * to * until 1 single_crochet remains ch1 sk1 single_crochet in the beg ch2 space of the prev row turn repeat step 2 until you have made a square leaving a 6 tail cut the yarn chain 1 pull the tail completely through the loop and cinch it tight with a darning needle weave in the ends
